title: ROOMLY
about: A roommate finder app where users can add, find, or manage roommates easily.
description: Roomly helps users search and connect with potential roommates based on preferences and location. Users can post listings, view profiles, and manage shared spaces in one streamlined platform.
challenges: Implementing real-time filtering and search functionality with Firebase and managing secure user authentication across client and server.

title: FOODIO
about: A restaurant management application where restaurant owners can sell foods and customers can order and manage their meals quickly.
description: Foodio enables food businesses to manage menus, orders, and customer interactions through a responsive web interface. Users can browse dishes, place orders, and track order status in real-time.
challenges: Designing dynamic role-based dashboards for admins and users, and ensuring secure and smooth checkout using Firebase auth and server-side validation.
